input_text:
Job Title: Field Service Technician I

Location: Louisville, KY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Innovate to solve the world's most important challenges

The future is what you make it.

When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers, and doers who make the things that make the future.

That means changing the way we fly, fueling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars. Working at Honeywell isn’t just about developing cool things. That is why all of our employees enjoy access to dynamic career opportunities across different fields and industries.

Honeywell is seeking a Field Service Technician based in Louisville, Kentucky.

Learn and complete the on-site inspection of gas facilities, appropriately investigate specific findings, properly document all inspection results, maintain a safe work environment, and respectfully communicate to customers. You typically work alone without supervision all over the 18 county service territory held by our client. You will follow detailed work instruction and escalate any identified concerns as necessary to either Honeywell management or host company personnel. You should identify, escalate, and explore opportunities to improve the procedures for the sake of efficiency and/or effectiveness. You should communicate any administrative difficulties relating to the documentation of various inspections. You will also be responsible for protecting and maintaining the equipment you are assigned to use.

Key Responsibilities

Inspect and document appropriately.Maintain safe work environment for yourself and others.Report Abnormal Operating Conditions if identified.Provide support for the work force when necessary.

You Must Have

High School Diploma, or equivalent. Valid Driver’s licenseSome experience in the field.

We Value

Previous industry experience.Previous technical/installation experience.Previous customer service experience.Good written and oral communication.Ability to follow instructions.Bachelor’s degree or technical/professional certificate.

Additional Information

JOB ID: HRD226023Category: Customer ExperienceLocation: 9901 Linn Station Road,Louisville,Kentucky,40223,United StatesNonexempt

Global (ALL)

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
